Thrush
If you suddenly get sore, 
bright pink nipples after you 
have been feeding without 
problems for a while, you 
might have an infection known 
as thrush. The pain may be felt 
right inside the breasts. Ask 
for help to check that your 
baby is latched on properly, 
and make an appointment with 
your GP.
